Made by <a href="https://github.com/HashRei">@HashRei</a>

# Getting Started

## Description

Official webpage of Silvan | Hashrei made with NextJS.

Inspired by the <a href="https://github.com/AsavariA/nextjs-portfolio-template" target="_blank"> nextjs-portfolio-template </a> of AsavariA 

## Requirements

- [git](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-Installing-Git)
  - You'll know you did it right if you can run `git --version` and you see a response like `git version x.x.x`
- [Nodejs & npm](https://nodejs.org/en/)
  - You'll know you've installed nodejs right if you can run:
    - `node --version` And get an ouput like: `vx.x.x`
  - You'll know you've installed npx right if you can run:
    - `npm --version` And get an ouput like: `x.x.x`

### Build with...

  ![Javascript](https://img.shields.io/badge/JavaScript-323330?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoColor=F7DF1E)
  ![Next JS](https://img.shields.io/badge/Next-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=next.js&logoColor=white)


## Quickstart

1. Clone and install dependencies

```
git clone git@github.com:HashRei/nextjs-webpage-porfolio.git
cd nextjs-webpage-porfolio
npm install
```

2. Run

```
npm run dev
```
